dc.title: Office of the Pentagon Chaplain
dc.description: The website for the Pentagon Chaplain, Office of the Administrative Assistant to the Secretary of the Army. The Pentagon Chaplains Office is committed to supporting the faith practices of the people in the Pentagon work force.
